tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I and my little one had amazing experience with Dr. Roshan Rayen. My wife and myself worrying about my kid ( Vansh Mittal) dental problem and pain he was having. Doctor has taken extreme care and carried out treatment based on comfort and response of my kid. Supporting doctors and other staff were also friendly and explaining all doubts patiently. In fact in case of emergency on Sunday i have been given personal mobile no sothat i can reach to doctor at any point of time. I would suggest for kid's dental problems, parents should take Dr. Rayen opinion before going for any other dental treatment. Thanks Dr. Rayen Ji, Manoj Mittal +919940046727
reply_text: Thanks for ur wonderful feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Have always been happy with the quality of medical service but this time, the entire process of scheduling and appointment was very disappointing. There was no guidance to schedule our follow up visit. The front office staff werent particularly polite when scheduling the appointment. My appointment time was changed and then changed back. We were a few minutes late for the appointment and were told that the Dr had left as there was a big surgery elsewhere. If the Dr had decided that we were worth only a few minutes of his time (as he would have anyway had to leave in a few minutes even if we had been on time), that is disappointing.  I hope this feedback is taken constructively.
reply_text: At the outset I would like to thank you for giving a recommended constructive feedback. It was an unexpected trauma surgery which had to be prioritised more than the regular appointment. So I had given the necessary instructions to my associate pediatric dentist to take care of your daughter. But unfortunately you were not comfortable to be seen by my associate. We will hereafter ensure this is not repeated again in the near future in your daughters appointment. Once again on behalf of my team my sincere apologies with regard to social skills at the front desk. We will look into that also. To err is human ‚Ä¶To forgive is divine..Even though we serve as doctors at the end of the day we are humans too‚Ä¶.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter is 5yrs old her dental health was very weak and  cavities around 12 teeth out of 20 milk teeth...am very upset with that..After taking treatment like dental filling and RCT ,Teeth are protected getting more infection..teeth was completetly cleaned and procedure done under GA...we were afraid of that procedure but Dr.Roshan sir clearly explained ...about GA and dental procedures...now we are happy about my daughter dental health and also they guide for good oral health...thank you sir...üëç
reply_text: Thank u madam for understanding the importance of the problem and getting treated under GA‚Ä¶

review:
*** ****** ******* ********* *** ********** *****

1. The fee was collected from me is too high. Not acceptable at all!
2. I was not informed about the processing of treatment 
3. After the treatment only I was informed and they collected the fee from us
4. For Scaling, I was told that Rs.1,000/-. But after the treatment, Dr. Rayen charged Rs. 1,200/-
5. For Rs.5/- rupee mask was billed for Rs.300/- 
6. Last year, in September, Dr. Rayen treated my son. He charged Rs. 24,000/-
7. This month, July 2021, we went for review. He charged Rs.5,000/-

NOT ABLE TO ACCEPT THE FEE HE COLLECTS.
reply_text: Madam please understand the disposable charges we collect is not for the disposable we provide to you alone but the entire team and the disposables used for the procedures also‚Ä¶‚Ä¶and the sterilisation charges incurred for the dental instruments etc‚Ä¶scaling charges are based on the severity of the condition..your child had a very bad hygiene..so the cleaning process was more cumbersome..so was the extra charges..sorry for informing prior that the extra 200 rs by the team‚Ä¶‚Ä¶It was ur son who insisted you to travel all the way from madurai to get treated with me at kidznteenz. He was not ready to get treated anywhere else. That shows the quality of treatment rendered for a seven year old kid without any pain and discomfort and how much of positive attitude he shows for getting treated with us‚Ä¶Hope this piece of information helps..last year charges of 24000 was for a whole bunch of work for which you asked for a discount and we provided that too for you..I vaguely remember and this time also u asked for a discount and we obliged‚Ä¶hope this information helps you to understand the way we handled your child helps

review: Dr.Roshan Rayen is a professionally **** **** *******. He had told us parents that this Jaw Correction treatment is one of the most complicated Dental procedures. As advised, we went forward for have the Jaw correction for Jacob, our son. The treatment involved many medical stages and equipment which came from Spain. Over a period of 24 months, the Team of Dentists at Rayen Dental Clinic gave us immediate care and medical attention in a child friendly manner. Under Dr.Roshan's expert guidance, Jacob's upper jaw has moved forward now. Practo software helped in timely appointment reminders. We as the patient's parents and the patient Jacob are very happy and satisfied with the treatment.
reply_text: Thanks Leena and Sushil on this great feedback..As a parent you have also done your responsibility in meticulously supporting us in all possible ways..greatly appreciated

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My daughter Ishidha is 6 years old and had cavities in multiple Tooth. I was very much worried that if she would cooperate for the procedure on chair, because I was told by my pediatrician that since the objects used are very sharp, it's better to do the procedure in an operation theater under sedation.
This made me very anxious. Reading the reviews online I chose to meet Dr. Rayan roshan. Trust me I consider myself wise for making this decision. Dr was very friendly, explained the procedure well. Made sure to build confidence in me and also make my child feel at ease
He did the procedure on chair with N2/O2 sedation . I was surprised, I daughter was awake fully oriented and cooperated very well. Did not show the slightest form of discomfort. She was watching her favourite cartoon while the Dr was performing the procedure.
The consultation and the procedure cost is very nominal compared to other paediatric dental clinic like peado planet. 
Thanks a lot Dr.
reply_text: Thanks for the wonderful feedback..Your child deserved it.... and please do not mention other clinic names when you write the feedback.....

review: I visited for¬†Surgical Tooth ExtractionI visited the clinic for extra teeth discomfort. Doc suggested mefor extraction. Sterday I done the procedure under nitrous oxide and La. Basically Iam very scary about dental procedures but sterday doc guided me well and unfortunately simple procedure turned big. Treatment ended up with stitched. Doctor done a great job he put full effort even though he had some health issues yesterday. Thank u so much doctor. I followed ur medication yesterday I never thought I recover soon. context: Dental Fillings,Tooth Decay,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Pulpectomy,
review: Doctor was so friendly. One can't control my kid as he is very playful and can't control him at one point. But doctor did it with so much ease and made my kid feel so comfortable and then he carried on with the treatment. One good thing I observed was before starting the treatment he is asking us to wait outside and making everything ready for that particular treatment and then only he is calling us for the treatment. By doing this he saves time especially for kids as you can't keep kids at place for more time. One big salute to the doctor for giving my son with good treatment and with utmost care. Also doctor was very cooperative for all my questions and cleared them with all smiles. Thoroughly satisfied with the treatment that my son has got from Kidz and Teenz. Thank you so much doctor.
reply_text:
Thank u so much for your great understanding about the way we function with children...working with kids every micro second matters...we cannot afford to
Loose it
